# PropertyListSerialization.ReadOptions

**Type Alias**

The only read options supported are described in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/PropertyListSerialization/MutabilityOptions].

## Declaration

```swift
typealias ReadOptions = PropertyListSerialization.MutabilityOptions
```

## Constants

- **PropertyListSerialization.MutabilityOptions**: These constants specify mutability options in property lists.
- **PropertyListSerialization.PropertyListFormat**: These constants are used to specify a property list serialization format.
